code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectBirds=function selectBirds(state){return state.birds;};export var selectCurrentBirdsInfo=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.currentInfo;});export var selectBirdsNames=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.currentName;});export var selectLevel=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.level;});export var selectScore=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.score;});export var selectTitle=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.currentTitle;});export var selectAudio=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.currentAudio;});export var selectAudioList=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.currentAudioList;});export var selectRandom=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.random;});export var selectAnswered=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.answered;});export var selectBirdsInfo=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.birdsInfo;});export var selecrExtraScore=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.extraScore;});export var selectEndGame=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.endGame;});export var selectColor=createSelector([selectBirds],function(birds){return birds.circleColor;});
